This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.13.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.12.x releases.

==Mobs==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Rabbit]]
|{{Animate|Brown Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; White Rabbit BE1.png; Black Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; Gold Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; Salt & Pepper Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; Black & White Rabbit JE2 BE1.png|128px }}
{{Animate|Baby Brown Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; Baby White Rabbit BE1.png; Baby Black Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; Baby Gold Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; Baby Salt & Pepper Rabbit JE1 BE1.png; Baby Black & White Rabbit JE2 BE1.png|64px}}
|
* {{BiomeLink|Desert}}
* {{BiomeLink|Flower Forest}}
* {{BiomeLink|Taiga}}
* {{BiomeLink|id=old growth pine taiga|Giant Tree Taiga}}
* {{BiomeLink|Snowy Taiga}}
* {{BiomeLink|id=snowy plains|Snowy Tundra}}
* {{BiomeLink|Frozen River}}
* {{BiomeLink|Snowy Beach}}
|
{{Drop|Item|Rabbit hide|0|1|}}
{{Drop|Item|Raw rabbit|0|1|}}
{{Drop|Item|Cooked rabbit|0|2|}} (if killed by fire)
{{Drop|Item|Rabbit's foot|0|1|}}
|
* New passive creatures.
* Will move away from the player.
* Carrots can be used for [[breeding]].
* Can damage crops.

==Items==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Items}}
|-
|[[Rabbit hide]]
|[[File:Rabbit Hide JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|Adult [[Rabbit|rabbits]] will drop 0-1 [[rabbit hide]] when killed.
|Can be used to craft [[leather]].
|-
|[[Raw rabbit]]
|[[File:Raw Rabbit JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|Adult rabbits will drop 0-1 [[raw rabbit]] when killed.
|
* Press and hold the {{Control|Use}} key in the hotkey bar to eat raw rabbit. Doing so will restore {{hunger|3}} and 1.8 hunger [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].
* Raw rabbit meat can be used to [[Breeding|breed]] or heal tamed [[Wolf|wolves]], guide them to move around, and also reduce the growth timer of baby wolves by 10%.
* Raw rabbit meat can be used to cook cooked rabbit meat.
|-
|[[Cooked rabbit]]
|[[File:Cooked Rabbit JE2 BE1.png|84px]]
|Adult rabbits will drop 0-1 [[cooked rabbit]] when killed while on fire.
{{Smelting
|showname=1
|Raw Rabbit
|Cooked Rabbit
|0.35
}}
|
* Press and hold the {{Control|Use}} key in the hotkey bar to eat cooked rabbit. Doing so will restore {{hunger|5}} and 6 hunger [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].
* Cooked rabbit meat can be used to [[Breeding|breed]] or heal tamed [[Wolf|wolves]], guide them to move around, and also reduce the growth timer of baby wolves by 10%.
* Cooked rabbit meat can be used to craft rabbit meat stew.
|-
|[[Rabbit stew]]
|[[File:Rabbit Stew JE1 BE1.png|84px]]
|
{{Crafting
|A2=Cooked Rabbit
|B2=Carrot
|C2=Baked Potato
|A3=Any Mushroom
|B3=Bowl
|Output=Rabbit Stew
|type=Foodstuff
}}
|
* Press and hold the {{Control|Use}} key in the hotkey bar to eat rabbit stew. Doing so will restore {{hunger|10}} and 12 hunger [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].
** After eating the rabbit stew, it will turn into a [[Bowl|bowl]].
* Can be eaten by [[Wolf|wolves]] to restore {{hp|10|mob=1}} HP.
|}
